content.question: The change in White and Black populations in the various regions shown in the table most strongly suggests the influence of which of the following?

choices.label: The eventual decline of enslaved labor in the Chesapeake and Carolinas
The colonistsâ€™ growing resistance to British imperial control in New England
The spread of epidemic diseases across North America
The demand in Europe for commodities such as tobacco and sugar

content.answer: The demand in Europe for commodities such as tobacco and sugar

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
